trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized"></xref> event raised by <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de methode die wordt afgehandeld tijdens de <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized"> </xref> gebeurtenis geactiveerd door <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized> event is raised when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system causes a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> to resize automatically.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized>gebeurtenis treedt op wanneer de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] indeling system zorgt ervoor dat een <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>automatisch moet worden aangepast.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler implementation would communicate size changes to the HWND contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.
trans-unit.target: De implementatie van een typische handler zou de grootte van wijzigingen in de HWND die zich in de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> communiceren
